sqlMap.select: select am.id, am.article_name, am.article_create_time, am.article_short_content, am.article_content, am.article_comment_id, am.article_field_id, al.name as label_name from rebirth.article_message am left join rebirth.article_label al on am.article_field_id = al.id where am.is_deleted = 0 and am.id = #id# order by am.create_time desc
sqlMap.insert: insert into rebirth.article_message (article_name, article_short_content, article_content, article_field_id, article_create_time, create_time, update_time, version) VALUES (#articleName#, #articleShortContent#, #articleContent#, #articleSortId#, curdate(), now(), now(), 0)
sqlMap.select:
select am.id, am.article_name, date_format(am.article_create_time,'%Y-%M-%d') as article_create_time, am.article_short_content, am.article_content, am.article_comment_id, am.article_field_id, al.name as label_name from rebirth.article_message am LEFT JOIN rebirth.article_label al on am.article_field_id = al.id where am.is_deleted = 0
date_format(am.article_create_time,'%Y-%m') = #monthType#
am.article_name like '%'||#keyWordsType#||'%' or am.article_content like '%'||#keyWordsType#||'%'
am.article_field_id = #articleLabel#
order by am.update_time desc limit #pageNo#,#PageSize#
